Posts.Content: peachapple wrote: Hi, I wonder if any of you might have similar experience. I had the surgery of lumpumtacy of my left breast in June and I found my left armpits got redden two weeks ago. I also found my left armpit is always warmer than the right one which did not have any surgery. Irene Log in to post a reply
